comment: The owner of the limousine involved in a crash that killed people in upstate New York over the weekend was a wire-wearing informant in two FBI terrorism stings, Fox News has learned. The government credited Shahed Hussain with rooting out radical Muslims at mosques in the New York cities of Newburgh and Albany while he was working as a well-paid FBI snitch.
amr:

The government credited Shahed Hussain with rooting out radical Muslims at mosques in the New York cities of Newburgh and Albany while he was working as a well-paid FBI snitch.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (l / learn-01
            :ARG0 (b / broadcast-program
                  :name (n / name

                        :op2 "News"))
            :ARG1 (c / charge-05
                  :ARG0 (g / government-organization

                  :ARG1 (p / person
                        :name (n2 / name
                              :op1 "Shahed"
                              :op2 "Hussain"))
                  :ARG2 (r / root-out-01
                        :ARG0 p
                        :ARG1 (p2 / person
                              :mod (r2 / religious-group
                                    :name (n3 / name
                                          :op1 "Islam"))
                              :ARG1-of (r3 / radical-02))
                        :location (m2 / mosque
                              :location (a / and
                                    :op1 (c2 / city
                                          :name (n4 / name
                                                :op1 "New"
                                                :op2 "burgh"))
                                    :op2 (c3 / city
                                          :name (n5 / name
                                                :op1 "Albania"))
                                    :location (s / state
                                          :name (n6 / name
                                                :op1 "New"
                                                :op2 "York")))))
                  :time (w / work-01
                        :ARG0 p
                        :ARG1 (s2 / snitch-02
                              :ARG0 (g3 / government-organization
                                    :name (n7 / name
                                          :op1 "FBI"))
                              :ARG1-of (p3 / pay-01
                                    :ARG1-of (w2 / well-09)))))))
